long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn a language with your favorite dictionary and Anki! 

With Dictionariez, you can:

* Double-click any word to show its definition instantly in a pop-up bubble.
* Right-click to access more comprehensive definition of a word.
* Click the extension icon anytime to look up a word in your chosen dictionary, without opening a separate dictionary website.
* Turn words from your history into Anki Flashcards with a single click for future review.

Why Choose Dictionariez?

1. Highly customizable: Choose dictionaries you prefer and set keyboard shortcuts that suit your habits.
2. Streamlined Learning: Read, learn, and export to Anki Flashcards with ease.

Key Features

* Authentic American and British accent pronunciation.
* Access multiple dictionaries for any language for a comprehensive understanding.
* Export words to Anki with one click.
* Auto-completion when searching for a word.
* Customizable keyboard shortcuts.

Find your favorite dictionary collection here: https://pnlpal.dev/category/4/dictionariez-trove

Need a specific dictionary? Post your request here: https://pnlpal.dev/category/3/feedback

Connect with us on Discord: https://discord.com/channels/772766989206421554/772766989206421560
